newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: More bodies found after Bangladesh ferry accident.
newsitem.headline: More bodies found after Bangladesh ferry accident.

text.p: Rescue workers pulled five bodies from Bangladesh's flooded Jamuna river on Thursday, raising the death from a recent ferry accident to 12, police said.
But at least 50 people were still missing and presumed drowned since a ferry sank late Tuesday in a whirlpool near Sariakandi town in the northern district of Bogra, police said.
The official BSS news agency in Dhaka on Thursday put the number missing at more than 100. At least 116 people were rescued immediately after the accident, the police said.
